resources.string: Something that you are counting days since it happened
Something that you are counting days until it happens
Add some widgets on your home screen and you will be able to see and edit them here.

Day Counter is licensed under the MIT license. More info here: https://goo.gl/cxRvtw

This app was programmed by Agustín Roth and designed by Agustín Roth and Christen Edmundson. The idea came from a Reddittor's comment that has deleted their account.

Reddit comment: https://goo.gl/huVoro

GitHub repository: https://goo.gl/ZH6yv5
